title: Books & Brews - Where Stories Meet Coffee

scenes.name: exterior_evening
scenes.description: Charming brick bookstore exterior with large bay windows glowing warmly, vintage wooden sign reading 'Books & Brews' with decorative coffee cup and book icons, autumn evening with golden hour light, fallen leaves on cobblestone sidewalk, warm inviting glow from within

scenes.name: entrance_welcome
scenes.description: Cozy entrance interior with exposed brick walls, hand-written chalkboard menu listing coffee specialties and book recommendations, potted ferns and succulents, comfortable vintage leather seating visible beyond, soft warm lighting from Edison bulbs, welcoming atmosphere

scenes.name: bookshelf_exploration
scenes.description: Floor-to-ceiling oak wooden bookshelves filled with colorful book spines, antique rolling ladder with brass fittings, cozy reading nooks with plush armchairs tucked between shelves, warm afternoon sunlight streaming through tall windows, dust particles floating in light beams

scenes.name: coffee_bar_craft
scenes.description: Artisan coffee bar with gleaming copper La Marzocco espresso machine, displayed pastries and fresh baked goods under glass domes, skilled barista hands carefully crafting intricate latte art rosetta, steam rising beautifully, warm ambient lighting from pendant lamps

scenes.name: reading_nook_peace
scenes.description: Perfect cozy reading corner with deep plush velvet armchair in forest green, soft knit blanket draped over arm, steaming ceramic cup of coffee on wooden side table, open vintage book with beautiful typography, soft warm lamp light, gentle rain visible through nearby window

scenes.name: closing_brand
scenes.description: Artistic tabletop composition of ceramic coffee cup with beautiful latte art heart beside elegantly open book, 'Books & Brews' logo subtly embossed on napkin, warm golden hour lighting creating gentle shadows, cozy blurred bookshelf bokeh in background, steam rising artistically

audio.music_style: soft acoustic guitar with gentle piano, lo-fi warm tones
audio.ambient: quiet cafe sounds, espresso machine hum, turning pages, gentle rain
